item.title: White House’s Hassett says Fed Needs to be Fully Independent From Trump
item.description: Former Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook has sued to challenge her removal by President Trump.

item.title: U.S. to Target More Businesses After Hyundai Raid, Top Official Says
item.description: Many of the 475 workers arrested during an ICE raid of a Hyundai factory in Georgia had ‘expired or tourist visas,’ the federal agency alleges.

item.title: South Korea Has Finished Talks With U.S. to Release Korean Workers
item.description: Federal agents detained Korean workers at a Hyundai factory in Georgia over their visas.

item.title: Volkswagen Unveils Compact Electric SUV
item.description: The German car company released a more affordable option to stay competitive amid U.S. tariffs.

item.title: The Impact of Empowering Employees With Internal Side Hustles
item.description: Employees who feel underutilized will either build value for you or for someone else.
